title: Freeze Etch - Pejorative EP
description:
1. Rebreather (Pt. 1)
2. Industrial Boy (Feat. Kenji Siratori)
3. Deadly*
4. Beeswax
5. Vehicularism*
6. Hull Breach

From the artist&#039;s site: "Pejorative is the first official release from Freeze Etch in over four years (following 2003&#039;s Helios EP). This self-released, severely limited and hand-numbered EP comes in an edition of 100 copies, packaged in vintage CD-ROM caddies featuring additional design by Eric Carl.

"Pejorative contains six previously unreleased tracks - including a spoken-word collaboration with notorious cyberpunk author Kenji Siratori, as well as two tracks (*) from the first-ever full-length Freeze Etch album, "Vessels," to be released soon on Force Of Nature. Get a copy while you can!"

You can get a physical copy (very limited release) and check out Freeze Etch&#039;s other stuff at http://freezeetch.com.

This is a CC-licensed album but I don&#039;t think anyone has actually gone about making a torrent of this album yet.
